detailsData.title: No Win, No Fee
detailsData.content: Thomas J. Henry offers a "No Fee Promise." We work on a contingency fee basis which means you do not pay our firm any fees unless and until we win your case. Learn more.

detailsData.title: Help with Bills
detailsData.content: If you've been hurt, you may have a damaged vehicle or be unable to work. We can help get you a rental car if your vehicle is damaged and even advance money on qualified cases.

detailsData.title: Full-Service Injury Firm
detailsData.content: We handle all types of injury cases, including vehicle accidents, slip and falls, medical malpractice, vehicle recalls, product recalls, pharmaceutical cases, mass tort, and more.

detailsData.title: We Come to You
detailsData.content: If you've been hurt, you may not be able to come into our offices to speak to an attorney. Don't worry, we will come to you wherever you are – at home, work, or hospital.

subHeading: THE LARGEST PERSONAL INJURY FIRM IN TEXAS
valueProp: Thomas J. Henry Law has 250+ personal injury attorneys in Texas available 24/7 to help you and your family. We have the scale, power and resources to handle any case.
CTA: Contact Us for a Free Case Review 866-517-5659 info@tjhlaw.com

testimonalData.text: Very professional and overall great experience!

testimonalData.text: At one of the lowest points in my life, when the world literally came crashing down on me, I made the best decision in my life by seeking immediate representation by this law firm!
